story.iWant: a fully configured React/TypeScript project with Vite build system
story.soThat: I can start building the web application with a solid foundation
story.tasks: - [ ] Initialize new Vite project with React/TypeScript template (AC: #1) - [ ] Run `npm create vite@latest net-pack-parser -- --template react-ts` - [ ] Configure `tsconfig.json` for strict mode and `@` alias (Source: architecture.md#Project-Structure) - [ ] Install and configure Tailwind CSS (AC: #2) - [ ] `npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer` - [ ] `npx tailwindcss init -p` - [ ] Configure `tailwind.config.js` for Deep Dive color theme (Source: ux-design-specification.md#Visual-Personality) - [ ] Set up shadcn/ui component library (AC: #3) - [ ] `npm install -D @shadcn/ui` - [ ] Configure `components.json` and install required base components (Button, Card, Table, Input, Select, Dialog, Tabs, Tooltip, Sheet) (Source: architecture.md#Component-Library) - [ ] Configure ESLint and Prettier for code quality (AC: #6) - [ ] Install necessary ESLint and Prettier packages - [ ] Create/configure `.eslintrc.cjs` and `.prettierrc.cjs` - [ ] Verify build system and dev server (AC: #4, #5) - [ ] Run `npm run build` and ensure no errors - [ ] Run `npm run dev` and verify dev server starts successfully - [ ] Implement global styles and theme (AC: #7) - [ ] Apply "Deep Dive" color theme to global CSS (Source: ux-design-specification.md#3.1-Color-System)

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Given a new project repository is needed When I initialize the project using `npm create vite@latest net-pack-parser -- --template react-ts` Then a new React + TypeScript + Vite project is created successfully 2. And the project includes Tailwind CSS configuration 3. And the project includes shadcn/ui component library setup (as per UX Design) 4. And the build system compiles successfully with `npm run build` 5. And the development server runs successfully with `npm run dev` 6. And ESLint and Prettier are configured for code quality 7. And the project follows the "Deep Dive" color theme from UX Design (Deep Blue #2563EB, Teal #14B8A6)

doc.title: Architecture
doc.snippet: Frontend (Browser UI) Initialization Command: npm create vite@latest client -- --template react-ts cd client npm install npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer npx tailwindcss init -p npm install -D @shadcn/ui

doc.title: UX Design Specification
doc.snippet: System: shadcn/ui (React + Tailwind CSS + Radix UI Primitives) Charts: Recharts Icons: Lucide React

doc.title: Epics
doc.snippet: As a developer, I want a fully configured React/TypeScript project with Vite build system, so that I can start building the web application with a solid foundation.

story-context.constraints: - Frontend Framework: React (v19.x) - Build Tool: Vite (v6.x) - Language: TypeScript (v5.7.x) - CSS Framework: Tailwind CSS (v3.x) - Component Library: shadcn/ui - Project Structure: Monorepo with `client/` for UI - Absolute imports with `@/` alias for `src/` directory.

tests.standards: - Unit tests: Vitest (for individual functions) - Component tests: React Testing Library (for UI components)
tests.ideas: - Verify `npm run build` completes successfully. - Verify `npm run dev` starts the dev server. - Verify ESLint and Prettier run without errors.
